name: Baseball Bat
description: A reliable melee weapon effective against most entities. Can be used to stun the Pit Maw or kill aggressive Mimics.

name: Z-Ray Gun
description: A futuristic utility tool. While its damage output is unspecified, it is essential for stunning enemies or revealing hidden entities in the dark.

name: Flashlight
description: Essential for survival in the pitch-black sewers. Critical for stopping the Bloomaw's attacks by shining light directly on it.

name: Shotgun
description: A powerful firearm available to the Veteran class. Highly effective against tough enemies like the Pit Maw.

name: Revive Syringe
description: A life-saving medical device used to revive downed teammates. Crucial for extending runs in co-op multiplayer.

name: Crocodile Egg
description: A high-value item that provokes the Crocodile. Once picked up, the Crocodile will relentlessly pursue you until you drop it or die.

name: Cooked Turkey
description: A food item dropped when a Fire Turkey burns itself to death. Valuable for the delivery quota.
